title: Authors and Citation
text: Margaux Götschmann. Author, maintainer. Joseph Lwere. Author.

title: Authors and Citation
text: Götschmann M, Lwere J (2024). “ugabore: Borehole repair data central Uganda.” doi:10.5281/zenodo.12188179, https://github.com/openwashdata/ugabore.
code: @Misc{gotschmann_etall:2024,   title = {ugabore: Borehole repair data from central Uganda},   author = {Margaux Götschmann and Joseph Lwere},   year = {2024},   doi = {10.5281/zenodo.12188179},   url = {https://github.com/openwashdata/ugabore},   abstract = {Data set about borehole repair records from the borehole operation and maintenance company operating in central Uganda. Population data is picked as an interview from a representative of the Local Water User Committees (LWUCs). The data on the technical specifications about the borehole is picked from the borehole records file from the company.},   keywords = {analysis,borehole,data,open-data,r,uganda,wash,water},   version = {0.0.1}, }

what: Borehole repair data from central Uganda
title: Borehole repair data from central Uganda
text: goal ugabore provide users documentation borehole repair data collected two districts central Uganda borehole operation maintenance program run. dataset associated following project report completed Joseph Lwere “data science openwashdata” course offered openwashdata.org.

title: Borehole repair data from central Uganda
text: can install development version ugabore GitHub : Alternatively, can download individual datasets CSV XLSX file table .

title: Borehole repair data from central Uganda
text: Boreholes main technology used access groundwater Uganda, according (Owor et al. 2022), also source drinking water households rural communities Africa, including Uganda (Lapworth et al. 2020). Therefore, crucial good quality data inform decision-making planning. project examines data collected two districts central Uganda borehole operation maintenance program run. professional operation maintenance considered future borehole functionality Uganda (Smith, Ongom, Davis 2023), project report offers insights research topic.

title: Borehole repair data from central Uganda
text: dataset includes information borehole repair records used borehole operation maintenance company operating central Uganda. package provides access one dataset. ugabore data set 10 variables 171 observations. overview variable names, see following table.

what: Example: Water production capacity versus number of people collecting
title: Borehole repair data from central Uganda
text: example illustrating relationship number people collecting water boreholes sub-county water production capacity corresponding boreholes. plot, see sub-county Kalagala highest water production capacity far. However, sub-county serves people, suggesting may richest one. another note, sub-counties Bombo Town Council Luwero Town Council people collecting water boreholes high water production capacity, indicating need improvement.
code: library(ugabore) library(ggplot2) library(dplyr)  # Define custom colors for plotting custom_colors <- c(   "Bamunanika" = "dodgerblue2", "Bombo Tc" = "#E31A1C",   "Busukuma" = "green4",   "Butuntumula" = "#6A3D9A",   "Gombe" = "#FF7F00",    "Kajjansi Town Council" = "black", "Kakiri" = "gold1",   "Kakiri Town Council" = "skyblue2", "Kalagala" = "#FB9A99",   "Kamira" = "palegreen2",   "Kasangati Town Council" = "#CAB2D6",    "Kasangombe" = "#FDBF6F",    "Katikamu" = "gray70", "Kikyusa" = "khaki2",   "Kira" = "maroon", "Luwero" = "orchid1", "Luwero Tc" = "deeppink1",    "Makulubita" = "blue1", "Namayumba Town Council" = "steelblue4",   "Wobulenzi Tc" = "darkturquoise", "Zirobwe" = "green1",    "NA" = "yellow4")  # Summarize data by sub_county summary_data <- ugabore |>    group_by(sub_county) |>    summarise(mean_well_yield = mean(well_yield, na.rm = TRUE),             mean_population_served = mean(population_served, na.rm = TRUE))  # Plot summarized data ggplot(summary_data, aes(x = mean_well_yield, y = mean_population_served,                           color = sub_county)) +   geom_point(size = 3, alpha = 0.7) +   labs(title = "Water collection versus production by sub-county",        x = "\naverage water production capacity in m3/h",        y = "average number of people\n",        color = "sub-county") +   scale_color_manual(values = custom_colors) +   theme_minimal()

what: Borehole repair data from central Uganda — ugabore
title: Borehole repair data from central Uganda — ugabore
text: Data set borehole repair records borehole operation maintenance company operating central Uganda. Population data picked interview representative Local Water User Committees (LWUCs). data technical specifications borehole picked borehole records file company.

title: Borehole repair data from central Uganda — ugabore
Borehole repair data from central Uganda — ugabore
text: tibble  173 rows 10 variables community Local name used refer administrative unit 5 borehole located. parish Local name used refer administrative unit 4 borehole located. sub_county Local name used refer administrative unit 3 borehole located. source_id Unique identification number assigned borehole borehole maintenance company. repair_date recent repair date borehole. population_served Number people collect water borehole. well_depth Total depth borehole (measured meters). static_water_depth Depth stable water level within borehole pumping happening (measured meters). pump_installation_depth Depth pump installed land surface (measured meters). well_yield Water production capacity borehole (measured m3/h).
